attributes.action: Sign this petition - Close the UK borders to further illegal immigrants.
attributes.background:
It's just not common sense!
Homelessness at an all time high,National Health Service stretched beyond its limits,both financially and physically,a benefit system undergoing major reform to the detriment of the disabled and less fortunate,how can we continue to allow more illegal immigrants in ?

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107117

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
